wikipedia.title: The Sequence
wikipedia.extract: The Sequence was an American female hip–hop trio from Columbia, South Carolina, who formed in 1979. The Sequence is noted as the first female hip hop trio signed to the Sugar Hill label in the late–1970s and early–1980s. The group consisted of Cheryl Cook, known as "Cheryl The Pearl", Gwendolyn Chisolm, known as "Blondie" and lead singer/rapper Angie Brown Stone, as Angie B who were all high school friends.

Tian-Tang.details: 在音乐、包括电影，我所知道的sequennce是一个专业名词，有别于order。因为Order更像是这东西的天然属性，而sequence是一种particular order，比如做一段音乐，剪辑一段影片，这个人为决定的次序，被称之为sequence。
